channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- External Links in New Window / New Tab
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- External Links in New Window / New Tab

item.title: CVE-2022-1583|2024-08-03T00:10:03.760Z -- unknown -- external%20links%20in%20new%20window%20%2F%20new%20tab
item.description: The External Links in New Window / New Tab WordPress plugin before 1.43 does not ensure window.opener is set to "null" when links to external sites are clicked, which may enable tabnabbing attacks to occur.

item.title: CVE-2022-1582|2024-08-03T00:10:03.636Z -- unknown -- external%20links%20in%20new%20window%20%2F%20new%20tab
item.description: The External Links in New Window / New Tab WordPress plugin before 1.43 does not properly escape URLs it concatenates to onclick event handlers, which makes Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks possible.
